update tb_dept
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_icon = #{deptIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_dept set dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_icon = #{deptIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
